name: Dice Caster (Mauvegrover)
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 51 - 10 Seconds

Once LD51 ends I plan to start updating.

Defend yourself from the mushrooms and their steady assault!

Instructions:

Left Mouse Drag dice into the white spell circle to prepare your spell.

Click the white spell button in the bottom-left to cast your spell.

The spell symbols need to match symbols orbiting the enemy.

Right Click to reroll dice.

Enemies cast spells with red auras and turn dice red.

A red die can be reset when used in a spell. Red dice cast by the enemy will cause damage to the player.

Defeat 20 mushrooms to win!
